item.title: GSoC24 @Sagemath: Final Report
item.description: Overview Google Summer of Code (GSoC) Project: Implementation of Tropical Polynomials and its Corresponding Tropical Hypersurfaces. As GSoC 2024 draws to a close, it’s time to finalize the report. My primary task was to implementing tropical polynomials of SageMath, where I focused on creating new classes that extend polynomial implementation to support coefficient from tropical semirings, along with several methods to manage various functionality. Additionally, I implemented a class for tropical varieties, which facilitates the visualization of tropical hypersurfaces for multivariate tropical polynomials.
